name: 1Huddle, Inc.
description: Developer of a game-based workforce training platform designed to onboard, upskill, and develop employees. The company's platform converts boring training material into competitive games that are proven to improve employee engagement and performance, enabling businesses to carry out sales and service training and education programs for their employees in a fun and interactive way.

name: AESOP Technology, Inc.
description: Developer of AI Enhanced SOlutions for Physicians (AESOP) designed to create decision support for physicians that improves healthcare quality and safety, and that makes billing related documentation easier using machine learning run on many patient visits. The company's technology offers decision support and reporting that flags inappropriate prescriptions, where the medications prescribed do not match the diagnosis, age, and gender of the patient, enabling users to enhance patient safety and medical billing accuracy.
one_liner: Developer of AI Enhanced SOlutions for Physicians (AESOP) designed to create decision support for physicians that improves healthcare quality and safety, and that makes billing related documentation easier using machine learning run on many patient visits. The company's platform is a home doctor service application that offers doctors, medications and laboratories anytime anywhere in less than 90-minutes, enabling patients and their family members to pick medical services as per requirement and get 24/7 healthcare consultation services at home.

name: AVIONETA Global LLC
description: Provider of healthcare services intended to help patients get rid of their alcohol addiction. The company offers a monthly subscription program that accompanies the consumer or their loved one through different services, as they progress with the program, they are able to have a healthier relationship with alcohol under measurable success criteria, providing patients with information based on science and medicine in a fresh, dignified and respectful way to control their alcohol addiction.

industry: App, Health Tech, Impact, Subscription, Wellness, Healthcare, Social Impact

name: Bariendo Inc.
description: Developer of an obesity management platform intended to provide a comprehensive suite of treatments, combining both medication and next-generation endoscopic interventions. The company's physician-supervised approach combined with remote monitoring technology sets a new benchmark in obesity care to accelerate the adoption of advanced obesity interventions, enabling patients to achieve their weight loss goals.
one_liner: Developer of an obesity management platform intended to provide a comprehensive suite of treatments, combining both medication and next-generation endoscopic interventions. The company's physician-supervised approach combined with remote monitoring technology sets a new benchmark in obesity care to accelerate the adoption of advanced obesity interventions, enabling patients to achieve their weight loss goals.

name: BILLIONTOONE, INC.
description: Developer of a molecular counter platform intended to increase the resolution of cell-free DNA testing. The company's pan-cancer tumor-naive oncology test precisely quantifies tumor burden from a blood sample to track response to therapy and its prenatal testing procedure focuses on quantitative biology and statistical learning methods to optimize the signal-to-noise ratio and detect single-gene disorders, enabling expecting mothers to detect disorders such as sickle-cell disease, beta-thalassemia, spinal muscular atrophy, and cystic fibrosis through a simple blood test.
one_liner: Developer of a molecular counter platform intended to increase the resolution of cell-free DNA testing. The company's pan-cancer tumor-naive oncology test precisely quantifies tumor burden from a blood sample to track response to therapy and its prenatal testing procedure focuses on quantitative biology and statistical learning methods to optimize the signal-to-noise ratio and detect single-gene disorders, enabling expecting mothers to detect disorders such as sickle-cell disease, beta-thalassemia, spinal muscular atrophy, and cystic fibrosis through a simple blood test.

The company's platform utilizes artificial intelligence, GPS-enabled, data-driven app to help users order, schedule pharmacy needs, save cost, to better serve patients comprehensively for better patients' compliance with improved accessibility & affordability, thereby enabling consumers to receive medicines with minimal effort and waiting periods.

The company's application offers current stats, fitness levels, and personal goals that are used for customized diet and workout programs that offer tools and food tables to follow the instructions and calculate the progress of the training, enabling users to track their fitness and to get diet and exercise from anywhere, at any time.

name: Hykso Inc.
description: Developer of a wearable motion tracker designed to monitor and view a fighter's punch output in real-time. The company's tracker tracks a hand's movement several times per second to detect the number, type, and velocity of all the punches, and its application permits measuring daily, weekly, and monthly progression, enabling fighters to compare their speed, punch count, and intensity compared to other fighters to better know their strengths and weaknesses.

The company's product digitizes collected data from disparate hardware providers, interprets it, and then creates analytics dashboards to see how both individual patients and groups of patients are doing, enabling healthcare providers to determine treatment plans and pharmaceutical options for patients.

The company's application guides users to make healthier choices by tracking parameters such as vitamin C, magnesium, calcium, salinity, oxidative stress, hydration, ketones, and protein straight to their phone in seconds based on weekly at-home urine tests, enabling users to track and know their bodies and health conditions.

name: First Opinion, Inc.
description: Operator of behavioral health and insights platform designed to help and intervene in people at risk of suicide and mental issues. The company's artificial Intelligence-powered platform provides feedback about imminent suicide risk in order for users to take the required action, enabling health professionals, hospitals, and families to assess risk as highly trained psychiatrists and provide detailed insights about the patient population.

name: YoDerm, Inc.
description: Developer of an online platform for connecting patients with dermatologists. The company develops a platform that enables users to get online acne consultation from dermatologists.

name: QueueDr LLC
description: Developer of an appointment tracking application. The company allows doctors to fill openings in their schedule through the application, helping patients to book those openings.

name: Kindara, Inc.
description: Developer of a fertility tracking application designed to revolutionize the women's health care industry. The company's application helps women to understand their cycle by tracking ovulation calendar and menstrual cycle tracker, empowering women to learn more about their bodies, enabling users to have earlier and better conversations about their fertility journey with their healthcare providers.

name: Neutun Labs, Inc.
description: Developer of a novel tracking software designed to track epileptic events. The company's novel tracking software offers a pre existing wearable offers continuous passive tracking, medication reminders, notification and recording progress services, enabling epilepsy patients with a seizure tracking tool to track chronic and acute health conditions.
